attributes.action: Open the NHS up back up for doctors appointments and visitors to hospitals.
attributes.additional_details: In every walk of life I can do what I like now,no social distancing and no mask,yet I can't go with my mum to A&E when she doesn't even know if she will see me again.Also the fact that people cannot see a doctor but can go to the football or nightclub and lose that patient care that could end up being critical for some patients care is not right.
attributes.background: Covid restrictions are destroying NHS care,whether it be that you can't see your doctor or that you can't be with a loved one at hospital when they are at their most vulnerable.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The decision whether or not to offer a face to face appointment is a clinical decision for individual doctors and healthcare providers, not the Government or Parliament. 

You may wish to raise this issue with the NHS directly. You can find out more about who to contact here: https://www.nhs.uk/using-the-nhs/about-the-nhs/how-to-complain-to-the-nhs/
